member.summary: Writes the buffered content to .
member.returns: A which will complete once content has been written.

summary.para: A that is backed by a unbuffered writer (over the Response stream) and/or a
When Flush or FlushAsync is invoked, the writer copies all content from the buffer to the writer and switches to writing to the unbuffered writer for all further write operations.

member.summary: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every public get property on the underlying type.

member.name: M:RazorLight.Internal.FastPropertySetter.GetVisibleProperties(System.Reflection.TypeInfo)

summary.para: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every non-hidden get property on the specified type.
excludes properties defined on base types that have been hidden by definitions using the new keyword.

member.param: The type info to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public properties of the specified type.

member.name: M:RazorLight.Internal.FastPropertySetter.GetVisibleProperties(System.Type)

summary.para: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every non-hidden get property on the specified type.
excludes properties defined on base types that have been hidden by definitions using the new keyword.

member.param: The type to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public properties of the specified type.

member.name: M:RazorLight.Internal.FastPropertySetter.MakeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:RazorLight.Internal.FastPropertySetter.MakeNullSafeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter which is safe for a null input object. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:RazorLight.Internal.FastPropertySetter.MakeFastPropertySetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property setter for reference types. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the setter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed. This only works for reference types.

member.name: M:RazorLight.Internal.FastPropertySetter.ObjectToDictionary(System.Object)
member.summary:
Given an object, adds each instance property with a public get method as a key and its associated value to a dictionary.
If the object is already an instance, then a copy is returned.
member.remarks: The implementation of PropertyHelper will cache the property accessors per-type. This is faster when the same type is used multiple times with ObjectToDictionary.

member.name: M:RazorLight.RazorLightEngineBuilder.DisableEncoding
member.summary: Disables encoding of HTML entities in variables.
member.example:
The model contains a property with value ">hello<".
In the rendered template this will be:
>hello<

member.name: M:RazorLight.RazorLightEngineBuilder.EnableEncoding
member.summary: Enables encoding of HTML entities in variables.

member.name: M:RazorLight.RazorLightEngineWithFileSystemProjectFactory.Create(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a RazorLightEngine instance using FileSystemProject.
member.param: By default, uses Assembly.GetCallingAssembly method. If the method that calls GetCallingAssembly method is expanded inline by the just-in-time (JIT) compiler, or if its caller is expanded inline, the assembly that is returned by GetCallingAssembly may differ unexpectedly. To protect against unexpected behavior, it is best practice to pass in an explicit Assembly via operatingAssembly.

member.name: M:RazorLight.TemplatePage.RenderSection(System.String)
member.summary: In layout pages, renders the content of the section named .
member.param: The name of the section to render.
member.remarks: The method writes to the and the value returned is a token value that allows the Write (produced due to @RenderSection(..)) to succeed. However the value does not represent the rendered content.

member.name: M:RazorLight.TemplatePage.RenderSection(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: In layout pages, renders the content of the section named .
member.param: Indicates if this section must be rendered.
member.remarks: The method writes to the and the value returned is a token value that allows the Write (produced due to @RenderSection(..)) to succeed. However the value does not represent the rendered content.

member.name: M:RazorLight.TemplatePage.RenderSectionAsync(System.String)
member.summary: In layout pages, asynchronously renders the content of the section named .
member.returns: A that on completion returns an empty .
member.remarks: The method writes to the and the value returned is a token value that allows the Write (produced due to @RenderSection(..)) to succeed. However the value does not represent the rendered content.

member.name: M:RazorLight.TemplatePage.RenderSectionAsync(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: In layout pages, asynchronously renders the content of the section named .
member.param: Indicates the section must be registered (using @section) in the page.
member.returns: A that on completion returns an empty .
member.remarks: The method writes to the and the value returned is a token value that allows the Write (produced due to @RenderSection(..)) to succeed. However the value does not represent the rendered content.
member.exception: if is true and the section was not registered using the @section in the Razor page.

member.name: M:RazorLight.TemplatePage.IgnoreSection(System.String)
member.summary: In layout pages, ignores rendering the content of the section named .

member.name: P:RazorLight.TemplatePageBase.HtmlEncoder
member.summary: Gets the to use when this template /> handles non- C# expressions.

member.name: P:RazorLight.TemplatePageBase.Output
member.summary: Gets the that the template is writing output to.

member.name: M:RazorLight.TemplatePageBase.FlushAsync
member.summary: Invokes on and on the response stream, writing out any buffered content to the .
member.returns: A that represents the asynchronous flush operation and on completion returns an empty .
member.remarks: The value returned is a token value that allows FlushAsync to work directly in an HTML section. However the value does not represent the rendered content. This method also writes out headers, so any modifications to headers must be done before is called. For example, call to send antiforgery cookie token and X-Frame-Options header to client before this method flushes headers out.

member.name: M:RazorLight.TemplatePageBase.Raw(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the specified string as a raw string. This will ensure it is not encoded.

member.param: The to use when this handles non- C# expressions. If null, does not change .
member.remarks: All writes to the or after calling this method will be buffered until is called.

member.name: M:RazorLight.TemplatePageBase.EndTagHelperWritingScope
member.summary: Ends the current writing scope that was started by calling .

member.name: M:RazorLight.TemplatePageBase.BeginWriteTagHelperAttribute
member.summary: Starts a new scope for writing attribute values.

member.name: M:RazorLight.TemplatePageBase.EndWriteTagHelperAttribute
member.summary: Ends the current writing scope that was started by calling .
member.returns: The content buffered by the shared of this .
member.remarks: This method assumes that there will be no nesting of and method calls.
